messages.subject: Re: Photo of my kids
messages.msgSnippet: To hell with what others think! He s
messages.messageBody:
<<<<I hope it doesn't disturb others too much that I
have a bald kid. It used to disturb me, but now he's
just Marty.>>>>

To hell with what others think! He's beautiful because
he's Marty and he's special! And he's allowed to be
how HE feels the most comfortable.

Meghan :-)

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Re: Photo of my kids
messages.msgSnippet: ... Ah yes, Dar s daughter. :-) ... why would it, or should it, disturb us?  I found it amusing that you have one with wonderful long hair and another bald.  I
messages.messageBody:
SandraDodd@... wrote:

>
> In a message dated 12/28/01 12:02:58 PM,
> zenmomma@... writes:
>
> << BTW Everyone's family is gorgeous. >>
>
> There are two other photos there already!

Ah yes, Dar's daughter. :-)

> People, walk softly in there--it's easy to
> delete them, and I personally had
> to work hard to get mine in there! I wish
> I'd used the better picture--same
> general pose, but Holly has her arms folded
> and is smiling hugely. She
> steals the picture in that one--it's like
> Holly and her backup singers, I
> say, and all who see it say YES IT IS while
> Holly says, "MOM, don't say
> that." She's a scene-stealer ordinarly, so
> you get to see the one where
> she's least flashy.
>
> I hope it doesn't disturb others too much
> that I have a bald kid.

why would it, or should it, disturb us? I
found it amusing that you have one with
wonderful long hair and another bald. I was
glad to read it was a "natural" baldness and
not one inflicted by other more horrible
means.

Joylyn

> It used to
> disturb me, but now he's just Marty. As of
> a week ago, he's shaving his own
> head instead of talking me into doing it
> every week or so. And he shaved his
> "moustachal area" although there wasn't
> much there. Kirby is shaving. Keith
> was no role model for them there.
>
> Sandra

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Re: Photo of my kids
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 12/28/01 12:02:58 PM, zenmomma@hotmail.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 12/28/01 12:02:58 PM, zenmomma@... writes:

<< BTW Everyone's family is gorgeous. >>

There are two other photos there already!

People, walk softly in there--it's easy to delete them, and I personally had
to work hard to get mine in there! I wish I'd used the better picture--same
general pose, but Holly has her arms folded and is smiling hugely. She
steals the picture in that one--it's like Holly and her backup singers, I
say, and all who see it say YES IT IS while Holly says, "MOM, don't say
that." She's a scene-stealer ordinarly, so you get to see the one where
she's least flashy.

I hope it doesn't disturb others too much that I have a bald kid. It used to
disturb me, but now he's just Marty. As of a week ago, he's shaving his own
head instead of talking me into doing it every week or so. And he shaved his
"moustachal area" although there wasn't much there. Kirby is shaving. Keith
was no role model for them there.

Sandra

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Re: Photo of my kids

>>Make a new one? Mine got messed up once when they changed to yahoo from
>>whatever-groups, and that's why I show as DuckfordU instead of
>>SandraDodd.>>

Oh my Dodd! It worked! Thank you. :o) Just to play it safe, in a
spiritual/unschooling sense, I tricked the Yahoo demons by signing in as
DoddGoddess. That did the trick. ;-)

BTW Everyone's family is gorgeous. If I can figure out how, I'll load one of
us.

~Mary

site. I don't don't know how I managed to sign onto this list, becasue now
when I type in my Yahoo ID, it tells me it's been deleted for some
infraction of the rules. Huh? Me? >>

Make a new one?
Mine got messed up once when they changed to yahoo from whatever-groups, and
that's why I show as DuckfordU instead of SandraDodd. It's frustrating. I'm
really sorry. If I could make a secret back door to the site I would.

Sandra
